Package ai.steeringbehaviors.pathfinding

Class SmoothPathFinding

java.lang.Object
ai.steeringbehaviors.pathfinding.SmoothPathFinding
public class SmoothPathFinding
extends java.lang.Object
The Class SmoothPathFinding. This class smoothes out the travel of character from the original travel points given from the pathfinding object

      public boolean rayClear​(Vector2 fromPt, Vector2 toPt)
